availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Wathen (Marion County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Anne L. Riney Wathen. Father of William W. Wathen, James Wathen. Merchant in Marion County in 1850. Employed N. J. Berry in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 747.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #000551244, p. 260.
Find A Grave, "John B. Wathen (1803-1885)," Memorial #41061165, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41061165 (accessed February 5, 2019).
